grammarScopes.title: Grammar scopes

extends.title: Extends
extends.description: List of ESLint shareable config names. See [shareable configs](http://eslint.org/docs/developer-guide/shareable-configs). Example: **standard, standard-react**

useEslintrc.description: Automatically load and use configuration files found in default locations.

rulePaths.title: Custom rule directories
rulePaths.description: Additional directories to load custom rules from.

allowInlineConfig.title: Allow inline configuration
allowInlineConfig.description: If false, ESLint suppresses directive comments in source code.
